name: OVERHEAT (itch) (Taneim, NiravGolyalla, broomen)
description:
A game made for NYU's Game Design course in Spring 2023. 

The central premise for this game was "Game Resources".  We chose 2 resources to focus on. The usual "HP Bar", and the more unique and complex "HEAT METER". The heat meter includes many positives and many negatives. As your heat meter rises you gain new abilities, but if it rises to 100%, you OVERHEAT. Once in OVERHEAT, you will start burning to death unless you cool down in time (either on a cool-down platform or not attacking or not taking damage). This is a resource management game as you try to maintain strong abilities while not dying due to overuse. 

Hope you enjoy this game!

Lore

A traveling robot must go to learn the secrets of its origin. Show the fires of your passion.
